column2: we went with the ribeye kushiyaki was actually my biggest disappointment.  Not because the food wasn't delicious--it was.  Actually
column3: it may have been the best tasting thing we ordered.  However
column4: it was almost stone cold by the time we got it.  Okay
column6: but it just doesn't make sense for the robata to not be piping hot.  We ordered it almost as an afterthought when we received our appetizer
column7: so I'm wondering if our waitress just forgot about it and it sat in the kitchen for a while.  Nevertheless
column8: that was the only major disappointment in the evening.
